Does Quest 5.6.1 work on Windows XP?

I downloaded Quest 5.6 for windows and it refused to work on Windows XP. I even downloaded a file that said was missing and another new error popped up. Forgot what error though.

Just like to know if 5.6.1 does work on Windows XP so I can download it.

Thank you.

Posts.EditableText: Everyone who uses win XP, are having the same trouble, there's already a thread on it. For now, just download v550 or v551, and it'll work fine for XP.

Posts.EditableText: v5.5 also works just fine with windows xp. Although I don't hear any sound when I play a game and the second problem is that when you need a key to unlock a container, it just doesn't work the way it should. It automatically unlocks if someone types unlock, without the key.
